resources.string:
XTextureExtractor - TCP port 52500

On Android phones and tablets:
Click the corners to bring up help and usage information.
Click the connection status to specify a manual hostname.
Click the instruments to cycle through each window view.

On Android TV devices:
This app will auto-detect X-Plane using BECN broadcasts.
Left and right remote control buttons cycle the displays.
Up and down remote control buttons toggle help information.
